about_the_game:
Plot
Katherine lived an ordinary life. A house on the West Coast, a family, a career. But in one moment, it all disappears. Her familiar life falls apart. Katherine will be forced to seek help on the criminal, nocturnal streets of the metropolis. Or maybe the police can help her?

Detective Ethan Dutch might be able to help. But his career in the police department is on the verge of collapse. Scandals at work, drinking, and a difficult character have brought the once-legendary cop to the brink of ruin. Can he restore his reputation and earn back respect?​

We are excited to announce a "Porcelain Dolls" is a gripping detective thriller that combines elements of classic action movies and noir. Immerse yourself in a dark world full of secrets, crimes, and unexpected twists.

What to Expect:
  • A captivating storyline with a blend of old-school action movie style and noir elements
  • Intriguing investigations and complex puzzles
  • Explicit scenes and adult-oriented content
  • Various gameplay options.
  • Play simultaneously as two characters.

Don’t miss the chance to be part of this exciting adventure!

content_descriptors.notes: This game, depending on the player's choices, may contain: scenes of violence, blood, strong language, alcohol consumption, drug use, tobacco smoking, partial or full nudity, sex scenes, scenes of sexual harassment, and scenes with BDSM elements.

name: Porcelain Dolls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Porcelain Dolls is a visual novel aimed at a mature audience, set in the detective genre. As players progress through the game, they will develop relationships with other characters and unravel the secrets of the criminal underworld.
